body.name: Projector With WiFi and Bluetooth 5G, VISULAPEX 15000L Portable Outdoor Projector Support 4K Zoom Max 220", Native 1080P Home Theater Movie Projector Compatible iOS/Android/PC/XBox/PS5/Fire Stick/HDMI
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 16 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 13 hrs 16 mins
features: 🌈[Native 1080P & Bluetooth 5.0] With a native 1080P resolution, 7000:1 contrast ratio and 12000 lumens, the VISULAPEX projector with wifi and bluetooth offers clearer, brighter and more realistic projection image quality. It also supports 4K, a projection size of 50-300 inches and a 50 percent zoom, which is suitable for projection in various scenes and gives you a wonderful visual experience.

🎦[Dual Band WiFi & HIFI Bluetooth Two-Way Audio ] The WiFi projector features 5G and 2.4G dual-band WiFi to ensure stable signals and fast transmission speeds. The Bluetooth projector has two-way HIFI Bluetooth audio, which can be wirelessly connected to Bluetooth speakers or used as an audio speaker. Please note: Bluetooth does not support connection with smartphones.

🎉[Flexible Installation & Vertical Keystone Correction] You can place the portable projector on your desk or mount it on a stand or ceiling. the ±15 Vertical degree keystone correction adapts better to uneven surfaces. It is not only suitable for indoor home theater, but also as an outdoor projector for outdoor movie nights, camping or traveling, and thanks to the sleep timer function, you no longer have to worry about accidentally falling asleep while watching movies.

🎮[Multi-Functional Connection & Strong Compatibility] This movie projector can use the "Airplay" function to project cell phone videos or the "Screen Mirroring" function to fully synchronize with the cell phone screen. Equipped with 2*HDMI, 2*USB, AV, 3.5mm headphone jack and VGA port, it can be easily connected to PC, TV box, TV stick, Chromebook, tablet, Blu-ray DVD player, USB drive, media player, cell phone.

🎁[Longer Lifespan & 2 Year Warranty] VISULAPEX projectors use advanced cooling technology to effectively dissipate heat while reducing noise by 60%, further extending the life of the LEDs while providing a more immersive viewing experience. We promise you 2 years after-sales warranty and lifetime service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The VISULAPEX S1 projector features a physically native 1080p resolution and higher brightness for a superior viewing. The manual focus feature provides better control to avoid machine errors. The elegant and retro design is the perfect companion for home theater, office, outdoor movie nights!
VISULAPEX Native 1080P Projector Support 4k, enjoy Full HD Visual Feast

Previous page Wired and wireless connections,meets the needs of different usage occasions. Connect external Bluetooth audio devices Enjoy louder and more powerful audio effects.(For audio transmission only) Multiple mounting options & 50%-100% Zoom Function Say goodbye to position or angle restrictions with zoom andenjoy oversized visual enjoyment anywhere Next page 1 Wireless Projector 2 Bluetooth Projector 3 Movie Projector
Reduces fan noise by 60% for a more immersive viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The VISULAPEX 15000L Portable Outdoor Projector exceeded my expectations with its impressive 15000 lumens brightness, providing vivid and clear visuals even in outdoor settings. The seamless connectivity through WiFi and Bluetooth 5G ensures hassle-free pairing with various devices, making it versatile for iOS, Android, PC, Xbox, PS5, Fire Stick, and HDMI sources. The native 1080P resolution and 4K zoom capability deliver a cinematic home theater experience, while the maximum 220” screen size adds an immersive touch. Its compatibility and outstanding performance make it a top choice for multimedia enthusiasts seeking quality and convenience in one package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It the best picture at the edges.
reviews.reviewText: Blurred images at edges. Center ok. Not very bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't believe my eyes when I was able to watch movies on my wall.So convenient and easy to use.It makes staying in the bed much more comfortable and enjoyable.

reviews.reviewText: The best projector I bought, I really like this item because it is very good and functional. when I try to use everything works normally, there is no damage when I try it, I really like this stuff, thank you very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Omg. I'm watching it at 80 inches on a white wall and it's so clear. Sounds via Bluetooth party boom fx that I bought from Walmart. Haha! Only problem I have is it only reads usb sticks not greater than 64gb. Other than that, this is an amazing buy. I can't wait to watch it at 100+ zoom on a bigger screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satisfied with quality color
reviews.reviewText: The picture output was clear and adjustable. You can have it on tripod and use it in anywhere. You also get 2 hdmi ports. It have built in bluetooth. You can also connect your headphones. I am really satisfied with what I get with whatever I paid. It have all the function as it was described. I really like it and it is very portable that I cantake it to every places i go. Price is very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A complete entertainment set!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this projector for my loft to screen movies from netflix and hulu this holiday season, i have been using since 2 weeks now and it works really great. it is a very light weighted and a beautiful set for home entertainment came with a bunch of accessories for setting up your home entertainment. It took me 15 mins to read and set up the equipment without any difficulty as the instruction manual was very helpful and has complete step by step steps. You can connect your pc/tablet via bluetooth and play videos or cast your screen to this projector device. Which is infact a great addition with an ease of using this device without any effort. We can adjust the screen lenght as we want and the remote response is pretty great. My family came over for the Christmas and we played a lot of movies using this projector as it was a full time fun and entertainment. I have included a unboxing video for your reference but this is amazing as can be used anywhere if you have a power supply. Good to have a screen but wall projector is great with the video quality and the sound is pretty great. Great purchase for the holiday season. Thanks amazon.
